title: Cosmic Cool Mint X Nicotine Pouches by Ace
description: TRY ACE COOL MINT NICOTINE POUCHES Cosmic Cool Mint X Nicotine Pouches by Ace is a powerful menthol flavour infusion. These pouches stand out from the competition thanks to their high nicotine content, which is designed for those seeking a stronger and more intense nicotine experience. Designed especially for seasoned users of nicotine pouches, offers an intense hit that elevates every pouch to a symbol of audacity and style. View all Ace Nicotine Pouches View all Mint/Menthol Pouches View all Stong Pouches View all Medium Pouches KEY FEATURES: Cool mint and Peppermint flavoured nicotine pouches Designed for a strong nicotine kick Great substitute for cigarettes Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free 20MG Per Gram | 18MG Per Pouch MORE ABOUT PEPPERMINT FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES Savour the cosmic charm of Cosmic Cool Mint X as it tantalises your taste buds with a thrilling symphony. Pure freshness is enveloped in a revitalising experience that combines a burst of refreshing cold with the crisp aroma of sweet peppermint. A layer of depth and complexity is added to the flavour profile by the cosmic dance of minty notes, making every moment spent with Cosmic Cool Mint X not only refreshing but pleasantly otherworldly as well. Cosmic Cool Mint X promises a complex voyage full of energising sensations and an unmistakable freshness that captivates the senses, whether you're an experienced aficionado or venturing on a cosmic tour of minty pleasures. MORE ABOUT NICOTINE POUCHES Ace's tobacco-free, slim nicotine pouches are perfect for discreet usage. Each pouch fits securely under your lip, offering you a discreet and effective nicotine experience. Ace's pouches are for experienced users and are available in a range of flavours, so make sure you check out the rest of the range. Additional Description Information: Brand Name: Ace Product Type: Nicotine Pouches Pouch Format: Slim Our Strength Rating: Strong Nicotine per (mg/Gram) 20MG Nicotine per Pouch (mg/pouch) 18 MG Flavour Name: Cosmic Cool Mint X Flavour: Mint & Menthol Pouches per can: 20 Shipping from: London, UK
